ValidationRule.description: Checks to see that the Income Verification, Partner Verification, and MCEC Technical Verification boxes have been complete for DOER Loan records.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(IsConverted,
PRIORVALUE(DOER_Solar_Loan__c )= TRUE,
OR(
PRIORVALUE(Technical_Approval_Verified__c )= FALSE, PRIORVALUE(Income_Verified__c)= FALSE, PRIORVALUE(Is_there_a_Partner_Record__c )= FALSE))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Income Verification, Partner Verification, and MCEC Technical Verification Boxes must be checked
